item.description:
Effective and Impressive Business Email Writing

Hello all,

Please join me for the Effective and Impressive Business Email Writing Seminar.

I recently had to study this topic and found a wealth of information! I will bring hand outs, books, and lead a dicussion on the following:



  • How to communicate clearly and quickly.
  • How to create an effective subject line.
  • How to walk the fine line between informal and inappropriate.


I am really excited about this meeting. I will also be holding a raffle for the books used during the seminar and other prizes.

Hope to see many of you there!

Best,

Qiana
item.name: Effective and Impressive Business Email Writing - 18 FEB 2010
